reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Philippines’ Response to Optimizing Testing, Empowered Communities, Treatment and Sustainability (PROTECTS)

description.narrative: Philippines - HIV - Pilipinas Shell Foundation, Inc. - PSFI. This program has the following goals: By 2022, reverse the trend of HIV epidemic by reducing the estimated annual new HIV infections to less than 7,000 cases.. The objectives of this program are: Increase condom use among MSM and TGW from 38% in 2018 to 70% in 2022. Increase HIV diagnosis from 72% (2018) to 95% by 2022. Increase ART coverage among diagnosed PLHIV from 57% in 2018 to 90% by 2022. Sustain viral suppression among PLHIV on ART at 90%. Reduce barriers to accessing HIV prevention, testing and treatment services in the health care delivery system

title.narrative: Impact indicator for PHL-H-PSFI
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Coverage / Output indicator for PHL-H-PSFI
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
HTS-Other 4 Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed among People who inject drugs and their partners during the reporting period
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
HTS-Other 2 Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed among transgender people during the reporting period
HTS-Other 3 Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed among young key population during the reporting period
HTS-Other 1 Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed among men who have sex with men during the reporting period
Percentage of facilities which record and submit data using the electronic information system
Outcome indicator for PHL-H-PSFI
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period

Percentage of people living with HIV not on ART at the end of the reporting period among people living with HIV who were either on ART at the end of the last reporting period or newly initiated on ART during the reporting period
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their last anal sex with a non-regular male partner
